SEARCH
Package fr.esiee.babaisyou.view

Class DrawEnd

java.lang.Object
fr.esiee.babaisyou.view.DrawEnd
public class DrawEnd extends Object
The DrawEnd class is responsible for drawing the end game screens, such as victory or defeat.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DrawEnd(int xOrigin, int yOrigin, int width, int height, ImagesEndLoader imagesEndLoader)
    Constructs a DrawEnd instance with specified origin, dimensions, and image loader.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    draw(com.github.forax.zen.ApplicationContext context, DrawEnd view, String nameImage)
    Draws the end game screen using the specified application context and DrawEnd view.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • DrawEnd

      public DrawEnd(int xOrigin, int yOrigin, int width, int height, ImagesEndLoader imagesEndLoader)
      Constructs a DrawEnd instance with specified origin, dimensions, and image loader.
      Parameters:
      xOrigin - the x-coordinate of the origin
      yOrigin - the y-coordinate of the origin
      width - the width of the drawing area
      height - the height of the drawing area
      imagesEndLoader - the loader for end game images
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the dimensions are negative
      NullPointerException - if imagesEndLoader is null

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public static void draw(com.github.forax.zen.ApplicationContext context, DrawEnd view, String nameImage)
      Draws the end game screen using the specified application context and DrawEnd view.
      Parameters:
      context - the application context
      view - the DrawEnd instance specifying the drawing parameters
      nameImage - the name of the image to draw
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if context, view, or nameImage is null
